reviews.review:
This game is a masterpiece. I can not put in words how much i loved the story in this game. The ending is amazing and GLaDOS is now one of my favorite video game characters.
I love the Half-Life and Portal universe and I can't wait to see what Valve has in store after making Half-Life Alyx.
Thank you Valve.
Glowing review here
cool dude

Portal 2 is a great sequel to the first installment. My only wish is that the game was longer. The characters were great as well as the atmosphere. I've always loved a good post-apocalyptic theme and this game captures it perfectly. There are a lot of little details, especially in the later half of the game, that really add to the experience.

What an excellent sequel to an already amazing game! I will say that Portal 2 is one of the few sequels I would argue is even better than the original. Portal was an excellent puzzle game, and the plot was simple but filled with excellent humor. Portal 2 goes even further and enhances so many aspects of the game, including the plot. Also, one of the main characters is voiced by comedian Stephen Merchant, who does a phenomenal job! If you're looking for an entertaining and relaxing game filled with humor and simple yet challenging puzzles, this is a great choice.
it can be challenging at times so it requires you to think, but it's not impossible and can become easy enough when you realise what you're supposed to do

I’d never played a valve game before Portal 2, but after a friend had recommended me the game, I tried it out for myself. Whilst I had not played the first game at the time, diving into the story was very simple and welcoming to a newcomer. I found the different levels very fun and complex at times. Puzzle games are some of my favourite games to play, and whilst jumping through portals continuously did make me feel nauseous at times, I felt a sense of achievement once I completed a level. The story nicely ties these levels together as well.
